column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Iroh says : " Are you so busy fighting you can not see your own ship has set sail ? "
#Text=Zuko says : " We have no time for your proverbs , Uncle ! "
#Text=Iroh says : " It 's no proverb ! "
#Text=Pirate captain says : " Bleeding hog monkeys ! "
#Text=Zuko says : " Hey !
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka , ca n't you make it go any faster ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't know how .
#Text=This thing was n't made by the Water Tribe !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , you did the water whip !
#Text=" Katara says : " I could n't have done it without your help .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Would you two quit congratulating each other and help me out ?
#Text=" Oh says : " That 's good ... " Katara says : " Aang , look !
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh no ... " Sokka says : " Have you lost your mind ?
#Text=This is no time for flute practice !
#Text=" Katara says : " We can stop the boat !
#Text=Aang , together , push and pull the water !
#Text=It 's working , it 's slowing down !
#Text=We 're doing it !
#Text=" Sokka says : " But we have another problem .
#Text=" Together says : " Jump !
#Text=" Aang says : " I knew a bison whistle would come in handy !
#Text=Thanks Appa .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , we owe you one .
#Text=" Zuko says : " My boat !
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , you 're really going to get a kick out of this .
#Text=That lotus tile was in my sleeve the whole time !
#Text="
